Title: Delver's Call: Kriegval's Rest
Description:
HELP WANTED

Kriegval's Rest has become overrun by kobolds! This once sacred resting place of the earthen must be restored.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Kriegval's Rest delve on any difficulty.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Bondaz at the Crossroads Plaza
RewardText: Kriegval's Rest is a sacred place to our people. Thank you for helping us restore it.

Objectives.Text: Kriegval's Rest delve completed on any difficulty
